-------
Changes
-------

0.4.1 - December 17th, 2008

 - fix, unique validator short circuits on form field validation and invariants
 - removed browser menu registrations
 - disallow field fields as container columns
 - redo unique validation in the presence of property/column aliases
 - server side sort, batching, paging json container views ( extjs / yui compatible )
 - traversable viewlet
